current_affairs.title: India Launches Gaganyaan Test Flight Successfully
current_affairs.description: ISRO successfully conducted a test flight for its first manned space mission, Gaganyaan. The test validated all major systems including the crew escape mechanism.

current_affairs.title: India Defeats Pakistan in T20 World Cup 2025 Opener
current_affairs.description: India won by 6 wickets in a high-voltage match against Pakistan in the opening game of ICC T20 World Cup 2025 held in New York.
